entry.title: Tuesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Ice pellets or freezing rain beginning before morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow or ice pellets. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to periods of snow in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle or flurries. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
